searchSql.baseSql:
<ifNotNull isLose> select * from ( </ifNotNull>
select m.pkid, p.property_addr, m.case_code, m.mort_type as MORT_TYPE_OLD, m.fin_org_code as FIN_ORG_CODE_OLD, m.cust_name, ISNULL(m.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT,0)/10000 MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT,--总金额 ISNULL(m.COM_AMOUNT,0)/10000 COM_AMOUNT, ISNULL(m.PRF_AMOUNT,0)/10000 PRF_AMOUNT,
m.SIGN_DATE, m.LEND_DATE, m.APPR_DATE,--批贷时间 (SELECT top 1 uj.real_name from SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB uj where uj.USER_ID=sp.PROCESSOR_ID) REAL_NAME, (SELECT top 1 uu.org_name from SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB uu where uu.ORG_ID=sp.ORG_ID) ORG_NAME, (select top 1 org2.ORG_NAME orgName1 from sctrans.sys_org org1 left join sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB uoj on org1.ID=uoj.ORG_ID left join sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB uoj1 on org1.PARENT_ID=uoj1.ORG_ID left join sctrans.SYS_ORG org2 on org2.ID=uoj1.ORG_ID where org1.PARENT_ID in ( 'FF5BC56E0E4B45289DAA5721A494C7C5', '8a8493d453141f3301532c9568011af9', 'd5878adf8b0c4032aeae895c701ed693', 'de81a98a8ec341caa8e9bc77c46cd370', '54b3233fdf994d9987e7c8febc223588', '960089538bc54a9a9139ef52ceb45b33', '6114AB949B4445828D4383977C4FAC71', '6a84979158b942b78a8a5921cc30b8c3') and org1.ID=sp.ORG_ID) ORG_ORG_NAME,
m.IS_TMP_BANK, --(CASE m.IS_TMP_BANK WHEN '1' THEN '是' WHEN '0' THEN '否' END) IS_TMP_BANK, case when c.LOAN_REQ=1 and (select TOP 1 M.MORT_TYPE from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1) in('30016001','30016002') and (select TOP 1 M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1)=1 then '1' when c.LOAN_REQ=1 and (select TOP 1 M.MORT_TYPE from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1) in('30016001','30016002') and (select TOP 1 M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1)=0 then '0' end SDSTATUS from sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE m left join sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO p on m.case_code = p.case_code left join sctrans.T_TO_CASE c on m.case_code = c.case_code left join sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR sp on sp.SRV_CODE='3000400101' and sp.CASE_CODE=m.case_code where m.is_active = '1'
<ifNotNull signTimeStart> and m.SIGN_DATE >= #signTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signTimeEnd> and m.SIGN_DATE <= #signTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull lendTimeStart> and m.LEND_DATE >= #lendTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull lendTimeEnd> and m.LEND_DATE <= #lendTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull apprTimeStart> and m.APPR_DATE >= #apprTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull apprTimeEnd> and m.APPR_DATE <= #apprTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull comAmountStart> and m.COM_AMOUNT >= #comAmountStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull comAmountEnd> and m.COM_AMOUNT <= #comAmountEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull mortTotalAmountStart> and m.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT >= #mortTotalAmountStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull mortTotalAmountEnd> and m.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT <= #mortTotalAmountEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull prfAmountStart> and m.PRF_AMOUNT >= #prfAmountStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull prfAmountEnd> and m.PRF_AMOUNT <= #prfAmountEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull isTempBank> and m.IS_TMP_BANK = #isTempBank# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull isLose> ) m where m.SDSTATUS = #isLose# </ifNotNull>

column.name: ORG_ORG_NAME
column.title: 贷款专员所属贵宾服务部
